name: The Pale Man
description:
You wake up in a park, in the middle of the night.  

Has someone trapped you?

Escape without getting caught!


Includes 2 endings and 4 difficulty levels WARNING

This game contains flashing images

CONTROLS

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Mouse: Look

Hold Shift: Run

Left Mouse Button: Interact

Tab: Inventory

Mouse Wheel: Togge Items

ESC: Pause

A game created by Max Rohrberg Music by Niebieski Tannhäuser
